selectedVerses.text: But he himself went a day's journey into the wilderness and came and sat down under a broom tree. And he asked that he might die, saying, "It is enough; now, O LORD, take away my life, for I am no better than my fathers."
And he lay down and slept under a broom tree. And behold, an angel touched him and said to him, "Arise and eat."
